00029 TableInfoMap::~TableInfoMap() {
00030   m_map.clear();

00034 bool TableInfoMap::get(uint32_t id, TableInfoPtr &info) {
00035   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00036   InfoMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(id);
00037   if (iter == m_map.end())
00038     return false;
00039   info = (*iter).second;
00040   return true;
00041 }

00044 void TableInfoMap::set(uint32_t id, TableInfoPtr &info) {
00045   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00046   InfoMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(id);
00047   if (iter != m_map.end())
00048     m_map.erase(iter);
00049   m_map[id] = info;
00050 }

00052 
00053 bool TableInfoMap::remove(uint32_t id, TableInfoPtr &info) {
00054   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00055   InfoMap::iterator iter = m_map.find(id);
00056   if (iter == m_map.end())
00057     return false;
00058   info = (*iter).second;
00059   m_map.erase(iter);
00060   return true;
00061 }

00064 void TableInfoMap::get_all(std::vector<TableInfoPtr> &tv) {
00065   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00066   for (InfoMap::iterator iter = m_map.begin(); iter != m_map.end(); ++iter)
00067     tv.push_back((*iter).second);
00068 }

00070 void TableInfoMap::get_range_vector(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec) {
00071   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00072   for (InfoMap::iterator iter = m_map.begin(); iter != m_map.end(); iter++)
00073     (*iter).second->get_range_vector(range_vec);
00074 }

00078   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00079   m_map.clear();

00083 void TableInfoMap::clear_ranges() {
00084   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00085   for (InfoMap::iterator iter = m_map.begin(); iter != m_map.end(); ++iter)
00086     (*iter).second->clear();

00090 void TableInfoMap::merge(TableInfoMapPtr &table_info_map_ptr) {
00091   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00092   InfoMap::iterator from_iter, to_iter;
00093   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
00094 
00095   for (from_iter = table_info_map_ptr->m_map.begin();
00096        from_iter != table_info_map_ptr->m_map.end(); ++from_iter) {
00097 
00098     to_iter = m_map.find( (*from_iter).first );
00099 
00100     range_vec.clear();
00101     if (to_iter == m_map.end()) {
00102       m_map[ (*from_iter).first ] = (*from_iter).second;
00103       (*from_iter).second->get_range_vector(range_vec);
00104       for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++) {
00105         if (range_vec[i]->get_state() == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED ||
00106             range_vec[i]->get_state() == RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK) {
00107           if (!range_vec[i]->test_and_set_maintenance())
00108             Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskSplit(
00109                                            range_vec[i]));
00110         }
00111       }
00112     }
00113     else {
00114       (*from_iter).second->get_range_vector(range_vec);
00115       for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++) {
00116         (*to_iter).second->add_range(range_vec[i]);
00117         if (range_vec[i]->get_state() == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED ||
00118             range_vec[i]->get_state() == RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK) {
00119           if (!range_vec[i]->test_and_set_maintenance())
00120             Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskSplit(
00121                                            range_vec[i]));
00122         }
00123       }
00124     }
00125 
00126   }
00127 
00128   table_info_map_ptr->clear();
00129 }

00133 void TableInfoMap::dump() {
00134   InfoMap::iterator table_iter;
00135   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
00136 
00137   for (table_iter = m_map.begin(); table_iter != m_map.end(); ++table_iter)
00138     (*table_iter).second->get_range_vector(range_vec);
00139 
00140   std::cout << std::endl;
00141   for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++)
00142     std::cout << "tidump " << range_vec[i]->get_name() << "\n";
00143   std::cout << std::flush;
00144 }
